Title: Azure Update - 4th July 2025
Author: John Savill's Technical Training
Description:
Happy 4th of July to all the US viewers!

🔎 Looking for content on a particular topic? Search the channel. If I have something it will be there! 🤔 Due to the channel growth and number of people wanting help I no longer can answer or even read questions and they will just stay in the moderation queue never to be seen so please post questions to other sites like Reddit, Microsoft Community Hub etc.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ C H A P T E R S ⏰ ▬▬▬▬▬▬ 00:00 - Introduction 00:23 - New videos 00:40 - App Service in Azure Stack Hub 25R1 00:58 - VM insights map and dependency agent retirement 01:30 - Azure Firewall DNAT FQDN filtering 02:15 - Azure DNS security policy 03:15 - Azure Files NFS encryption-in-transit 04:19 - Azure SQL DB enhanced audit 04:53 - Azure SQL DB to hyperscale migration updates 05:27 - mssql-python driver update 05:53 - MSSQL extension for VS Code updates 06:30 - Cosmos DB for MongoDB secondary users 06:59 - PostgreSQL flex 17 upgrade 07:22 - Azure Monitor Metrics query editor 07:40 - Entra Domain Services forest trust updates 09:00 - Close
